# <a name="keyboard-shortcuts-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="c852a-102">Sneltoetsen in Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c852a-102">Keyboard shortcuts in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c852a-103">In Outlook.com kunt u de sneltoetsen gebruiken voor de e-mail service waarmee u werkt, zoals Gmail, Yahoo mail of Outlook.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c852a-103">In Outlook.com you can use the same keyboard shortcuts as the email service you're used to working with, such as Gmail, Yahoo Mail, or Outlook.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c852a-104">Ga naar [toegankelijkheidsinstellingen](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c852a-104">Go to [Accessibility settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="c852a-105">**Instellingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c852a-105">**Settings**</span></span> 
 > <span data-ttu-id="c852a-106">**Alle Outlook-instellingen**  >  weergeven **Algemeen**  >  **Toegankelijkheid**) en kies de toetsenbordsneltoetsen die u wilt gebruiken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c852a-106">**View all Outlook settings** > **General** > **Accessibility**) and choose which keyboard shortcuts you'd like use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c852a-107">Zie [Toetsenbordsneltoetsen voor Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)voor een overzicht van de volledige lijst met sneltoetsen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c852a-107">To see the full list of keyboard shortcuts, see [Outlook.com keyboard shortcuts](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
